Introduction
This topic contains information on reducing or discontinuing an award because of a change in A&A status, including
adjusting/discontinuing pension when A&A benefits were erroneously paid based on patient status in a non-qualifying facility
adjusting for A&A or housebound for a prior period after the patient has been discharged
, and
example of paying the housebound rate for a prior period of nursing home care after discharge from the facility
.
title: M21-1, Part IX, Subpart ii, Chapter 1, Section B - Aid and Attendance (A&A) Status for Beneficiaries Who Are Patients in a Qualified Nursing Home
citation: Part IX, Subpart ii, Chapter 1, Section B
